segments.text: Steven , I need badly your help .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My wife has found that I have an affair with my secretary , and now she is going to divorce me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How could you cheat on your wife ? You have been married for ten years .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I know I'm wrong . But I swear that the affair lasts only for two months . And I still love my wife . I couldn't live without her .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I will try my best to persuade her to reconsider the divorce . But are you sure that from now on you will be faithful to her forever ?
segments.speaker: S2
